OrderItemRateAdjustment.name: OrderItemRateAdjustment
OrderItemRateAdjustment.description: Represents the negotiated rate adjustment for an order product.

AdjustmentType.description: Specifies the type of rate adjustment.

LowerBound.description: The minimum quantity for the adjustment to be applicable.

Name.description: The name of the order item rate adjustment.

OrderItemRateCardEntryId.description: The parent order item rate card entry associated with the order item rate adjustment.

UpperBound.description: The quantity below which the adjustment must be applicable. For example, if you want the adjustment to be applicable when the quantity is 99 or less, set this value to 100.
